#summary Golf Markup Language Documentation: complexType PositionWithSequence.

== Name ==

*[CPositionWithSequence PositionWithSequence]*

  	

===  Super Types ===
{{{
anyType
  |
  +--[CPosition Position] (restriction)
       |
       +--PositionWithSequence (extension)
}}}
----
    

===  Documentation ===
        
			Coordinate of a point in a list of points (polygon).
		
  	
===  Properties ===

  	This component is not nillable.
---- 	
        
===  Model ===

	<...  
            *number = xs:nonNegativeInteger*
          >  ([CPositionGPS position-gps] | [CRoomForExtension position-other]) </...>

----
    

=== Nested Element Summary ===
        
|| [CPositionGPS golfml:PositionGPS] || [CPositionGPS position-gps] ||  					GPS coordinate of a point.				 ||
|| [CRoomForExtension golfml:RoomForExtension] || [CRoomForExtension position-other] ||  					Coordinate of a point in an arbitraty unit system.				 ||      

=== Attributes ===

|| Name || Description || Type || Use || Default || Fixed || Form ||
        
|| number ||   || xs:nonNegativeInteger || required ||  ||  || unqualified ||

===  Local Usage ===

    	[CAreaOfInterest AreaOfInterest]
----
    <xs:complexType name="PositionWithSequence">  <xs:complexContent>    <xs:extension base="golfml:Position">      <xs:attribute name="number" type="xs:nonNegativeInteger" use="required"/>    </xs:extension>  </xs:complexContent></xs:complexType>
